txt.en: There are mounted scouts of the Enemy abroad
Defeated mounted enemies in the Entwash Vale ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
While patrolling the Entwash Vale on behalf of Lady Góda, you came across mounted scouts of the Enemy.
While patrolling the Entwash Vale on behalf of Lady Góda, you came across mounted scouts of the Enemy.\n\nYou should defeat a few.
Mounted enemies can be found throughout the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should take the opportunity to rid the Entwash Vale of some of the Enemy's mounted scouts.

'You fool! I should have you thrown in the jail for your act! Do you not yet understand that the hunting of Orcs in Rohan is forbidden?\n\n'I yet have use for you, so I will let this pass, but do not let it happen again! You are only to scout the strength of the Enemy.'
Mounted enemies can be found throughout the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should take the opportunity to rid the Entwash Vale of some of the Enemy's mounted scouts.
Lady Góda is in the Mead Hall of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should return to Góda and let her know what you have done.
Defeat mounted enemies in the Entwash Vale
Defeat mounted enemies in the Entwash Vale ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Góda in the Mead Hall of Eaworth
